stimulusHtml: Let f be a function that is continuous on the closed interval [ 2,4 ] MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A4F@ with f( 2 )=10 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3BDE@ and f( 4 )=20 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3BE1@ . Which of the following is guaranteed by the Intermediate Value Theorem?
choicesHtml: f( x )=13 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3C22@ has at least one solution in the open interval ( 2,4 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@39E6@ .

f attains a maximum on the open interval ( 2,4 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@39E6@ .

f ′ ( x )=5 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B75@ has at least one solution in the open interval ( 2,4 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@39E6@ .

f ′ ( x )>0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3B72@  for all x in the open interval ( 2,4 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@39E6@ .
